name: thatched
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A thatched roof is made from straw or reeds; a thatched building has a roof that is made from straw or reeds: They live in a thatched cottage/a cottage with a thatched roof. See
thatch
More examplesFewer examplesA lot of people in England have an idealized picture of a rural idyll, living in a thatched cottage surrounded by rose bushes. In Thailand, chickens roam freely around thatched houses and on small farms. The property is thatched and said to date back to medieval times.Thatched roofs are not cheap on maintenance.In Ecuador he shared a thatched hut with seven people, a cat, two dogs and 15 guinea pigs.
